desc: Set the status for an AI assistant thread.

token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

channel_id.desc: Channel ID containing the assistant thread.

thread_ts.desc: Message timestamp of the thread of where to set the status.

status.desc: Status of the specified bot user, e.g., 'is thinking...'. A two minute timeout applies, which will cause the status to be removed if no message has been sent.

loading_messages.desc: The list of messages to rotate through as a loading indicator. Maximum of 10 messages.

channel_not_found.desc: Error returned when given an invalid channel_id

invalid_thread_ts.desc: Error returned when given an invalid thread_ts

reserved_username.desc: Reserved usernames are not allowed to be used.

error.description: Typical error response for invalid channel
